content.prompt: A researcher claims that an individual has protoporphyria, based on a physical exam. Which of the following techniques would most likely confirm the researcher’s claim?

choices.label: Transforming bacteria with the mutant variation of ALAS2 to measure gene expression
Culturing cells from the individual in the lab and measuring the cells’ growth rate
Using light microscopy to examine the individual’s chromosomes during metaphase
Determining the nucleotide sequence of the individual’s ALAS2 alleles

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
